name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Gary Lee ROCK, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Gary Lee ROCK, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John R. Walker, Dist. Atty., John F. Nelson, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1150
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Gary Lee ROCK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 18, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
David Rudovsky, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John R. Walker, Dist. Atty., John F. Nelson, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
